title: Hanakappa Movie: Hana-sake! Pakkaan Chou no Kuni no Daibouken
synopsis: In the film, butterfly warriors suddenly appear in Yamabiko and snatch away Hana Kappa's mother and others. Hana Kappa and his friends head out towards the mystery-filled land of butterflies. They overcome obstacles such as mountains and deserts and along the way, encounter a mysterious boy named Poru. (Source: ANN)
